ModInfo.Name: Sheepy's Smaller Pistol and Shield Tweaks
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Reduce size of all pistols (3x2 to 2x2), baton (3x2 to 3x1), and shields (3x6 to 3x5).
This mod is language-independent and should have a low priority to avoid interference with other weapon mods.
Sheepy's tweaks are mechanically compatible with each other in alphabetic order, and are compatible with and without Community Edition.
Mod home: https://github.com/Sheep-y/xenonauts-mods
